message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with the problem of minimizing the Age of Information (AoI) in a system with multiple sensors, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The proposed sensor scheduling policies also involve learning and optimization, which are topics in machine learning (cs.LG) and mathematical optimization (cs.MA). Finally, the paper discusses the tradeoffs and performance of the proposed policies in a system with multiple components, which is a topic in systems engineering (cs.SY).
